column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Solid breakfast stop. However
column2: I think the pancakes are over-rated in these reviews. Also had The Garden skillet dish which was good but not great
column3: the asparagus was tough and chewy.  My husband  had the veggie wrap which he liked and would rate a 4 out of 5 stars.  The employees are friendly and efficient.  We arrived at 9 a.m. on a Sunday and were seated after 15 minutes which was fine. When we left
column4: there were lots of people standing around waiting.  Not worth more than a 15-20 minute wait.
